channel.title: How Bryan Harris Launched to $200k+ and Built His Email List
channel.description:
Just released today's episode of Zero to Scale. It's an interview we did with Bryan Harris where we discuss some great points about finding first customers, building an email list, and ultimately how he launched a product and received over $200k+ in a matter of days.
http://zerotoscale.com/35/
Thought this would be helpful for fellow bootstrappers!

item.title: How Bryan Harris Launched to $200k+ and Built His Email List
item.dc:creator: JustinMcGill
item.description:
Hey Matt - appreciate you bringing this to my attention. Sounds like we definitely need to clean up the mobile responsiveness!

Read full topic

item.title: How Bryan Harris Launched to $200k+ and Built His Email List
item.dc:creator: mpalmer
item.description:
Hi Justin, a couple of notes on the design of the site:

  • I browse with JS disabled by default, and there’s no visible way to download the episode.
  • When viewing the site on my phone, I got about twelve words into the text when the content was completely obscured by a “sign up to our list!” box, “Powered by Drip”. Absolutely terrible UX; if I hadn’t visited the episode page from here, so I knew what I was getting in for, that would have been the end of my visit.

Hope that helps.

Read full topic
item.source: How Bryan Harris Launched to $200k+ and Built His Email List

item.title: How Bryan Harris Launched to $200k+ and Built His Email List
item.dc:creator: JustinMcGill
item.description:
Just released today’s episode of Zero to Scale. It’s an interview we did with Bryan Harris where we discuss some great points about finding first customers, building an email list, and ultimately how he launched a product and received over $200k+ in a matter of days.

Zero to Scale – 23 Jul 15

Episode 35: Nailing the Launch and Email List Building with Bryan Harris

Bryan Harris of Videofruit is our guest today. Bryan got his start as an online entrepreneur by using videos to promote apps.  That developed into the addition of a blog.  He uses reverse engineering of what the top online marketers are... Continue...

Thought this would be helpful for fellow bootstrappers!
